mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.order_type AS "orderType", a.order_no AS "orderNo", a.order_status AS "orderStatus", a.pay_status AS "payStatus", a.pay_way AS "payWay", a.total_amount AS "totalAmount", a.amount AS "amount", a.pay_amount AS "payAmount", a.consignee_name AS "consigneeName", a.consignee_phone AS "consigneePhone", a.consignee_address AS "consigneeAddress", a.total_qty AS "totalQty", a.freight_fee AS "freightFee", a.freight_number AS "freightNumber", a.logistics_no AS "logisticsNo", a.logistics_name AS "logisticsName", a.is_eval AS "isEval", a.sale_after_remarks AS "saleAfterRemarks", a.sale_after_date AS "saleAfterDate", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", u.name AS "createBy.name", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.del_flag AS "delFlag", a.pay_date AS "payDate", a.delivery_time AS "deliveryTime", a.is_export AS "isExport", a.merchant_id AS "merchantId"
left join sys_user u ON u.id = a.create_by
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO order_main( order_type, order_no, order_status, pay_status, pay_way, total_amount, amount, pay_amount, consignee_name, consignee_phone, consignee_address, total_qty, freight_fee, freight_number, logistics_no, logistics_name, is_eval, sale_after_remarks, sale_after_date, remarks, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, del_flag, pay_date, delivery_time, is_export, merchant_id ) VALUES ( #{orderType}, #{orderNo}, #{orderStatus}, #{payStatus}, #{payWay}, #{totalAmount}, #{amount}, #{payAmount}, #{consigneeName}, #{consigneePhone}, #{consigneeAddress}, #{totalQty}, #{freightFee}, #{freightNumber}, #{logisticsNo}, #{logisticsName}, #{isEval}, #{saleAfterRemarks}, #{saleAfterDate}, #{remarks}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{delFlag}, #{payDate}, #{deliveryTime}, #{isExport}, #{merchantId} )

INSERT INTO order_main
order_type,
order_no,
order_status,
pay_status,
pay_way,
total_amount,
amount,
pay_amount,
consignee_name,
consignee_phone,

freight_number,

logistics_name,
is_eval,
sale_after_remarks,
sale_after_date,
remarks,
create_by,
create_date,
update_by,
update_date,
del_flag,
pay_date,
delivery_time,
is_export,
merchant_id,

mapper.update: UPDATE order_main SET order_type = #{orderType}, order_no = #{orderNo}, order_status = #{orderStatus}, total_amount = #{totalAmount}, consignee_name = #{consigneeName}, consignee_phone = #{consigneePhone}, consignee_address = #{consigneeAddress}, total_qty = #{totalQty}, freight_number = #{freightNumber}, logistics_no = #{logisticsNo}, logistics_name = #{logisticsName}, sale_after_remarks = #{saleAfterRemarks}, sale_after_date = #{saleAfterDate}, remarks = #{remarks}, update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate}, pay_date = #{payDate}, delivery_time = #{deliveryTime}, is_export = #{isExport}, merchant_id = #{merchantId} WHERE id = #{id}

UPDATE order_main
order_type = #{orderType},
order_no = #{orderNo},
order_status = #{orderStatus},
total_amount = #{totalAmount},
consignee_name = #{consigneeName},
consignee_phone = #{consigneePhone},
consignee_address = #{consigneeAddress},
total_qty = #{totalQty},
freight_number = #{freightNumber},
logistics_no = #{logisticsNo},
logistics_name = #{logisticsName},
sale_after_remarks = #{saleAfterRemarks},
sale_after_date = #{saleAfterDate},
remarks = #{remarks},
update_by = #{updateBy.id},
update_date = #{updateDate},
pay_date = #{payDate},
delivery_time = #{deliveryTime},
is_export = #{isExport},
merchant_id = #{merchantId},
WHERE id = #{id}
